0.1.name: wordpress/document-library
0.1.description:
Document Library plugin for handling documents as custom post type and its taxonomies ,and have UI for editing taxonomies. Also have shortcode for viewing and searching documents and also widget for showing documents.

If you have suggestions for a new add-on, feel free to let me know about it on http://www.hmayaktigranyan.com .

This plugin sponsor is http://www.huridocs.org/
